Padding.description: Adds padding to the menu item

ItemSpacing.description: Adds space between Icons and ContentStack (Label & Description)
Adds space between Label & Description

BorderRadius.description: Defines the border radius of a single menu item.

Padding.description: Defines the padding around the section title text. Apply on SectionTitleWrapper

ItemSpacing.description: Defines the space between each menu section

Padding.description: Defines the padding around all stacked menu sections.

BorderRadius.description: Defines the border radius of the whole menu component

PaddingTopBottom.description: Apply on tooltips where the nose is either left or right. The pading defines the inset of the nose.

PaddingLeftRight.description: Apply on tooltips where the nose is either top or bottom. The pading defines the inset of the nose.

MinWidth.description: Defines the minimum width of the tooltip.

MaxWidth.description: Defines the maximum Width of the tooltip.
